    TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams
    entryCode(String entryCode)
    Make the tournament private, and restrict access with a entry code.
    You can either share this entry code directly with the users who should be able to join,
    or you could use it to create user-specific entry codes which you can share - see TournamentsApiAuth.generateUserEntryCodes(String, Set).

  • Method Details

    • name

      TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams name(String name)
      Parameters:
      name - The tournament name. Leave empty to get a random Grandmaster name

    • minutes

      TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams minutes(int minutes)
      Parameters:
      minutes - How long the tournament lasts, in minutes.
      [ 20, 25, 30, 35, 40, 45, 50, 55, 60, 70, 80, 90, 100, 110, 120, 150, 180, 210, 240, 270, 300, 330, 360, 420, 480, 540, 600, 720 ]
      Default: 100 minutes

    • startTime

      TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams startTime(Function<TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams.StartTime.Provider, TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams.StartTime> startTime)
      Parameters:
      startTime - When the tournament starts. Skipping this parameter defaults to in 5 minutes.

    • startTime

      default TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams startTime(ZonedDateTime startTime)
      Parameters:
      startTime - When the tournament starts. Skipping this parameter defaults to in 5 minutes.

    • variant

      TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams variant(Variant variant)
      Optionally specify a variant. Default value is "standard". Note, to use custom FEN (FromPosition or Chess960 variants), the tournament can not be `rated` and any Chess960 FEN must be a valid Chess960 position.
      Parameters:
      variant - The variant to play in the tournament

    • variant

      default TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams variant(Function<Variant.Provider, Variant> variant)

    • rated

      TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams rated(boolean rated)
      Parameters:
      rated - Games are rated and impact players ratings

    • rated

      default TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams rated()

    • position

      @Deprecated default TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams position(String position)
      Deprecated.
      Use variant(Variant) FromPosition or Chess960
      Parameters:
      position - Custom initial position (in FEN). Variant must be `standard`, `fromPosition`, or `chess960` (if a valid 960 starting position), and the game cannot be rated.

    • berserkable

      TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams berserkable(boolean berserkable)
      Parameters:
      berserkable - Whether the players can use berserk

    • berserkable

      default TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams berserkable()

    • streakable

      TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams streakable(boolean streakable)
      Parameters:
      streakable - After 2 wins, consecutive wins grant 4 points instead of 2.

    • streakable

      default TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams streakable()

    • withChat

      TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams withChat(boolean withChat)
      Parameters:
      withChat - Whether the players can discuss in a chat

    • withChat

      default TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams withChat()

    • description

      TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams description(String description)
      Parameters:
      description - Anything you want to tell players about the tournament

    • entryCode

      TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams entryCode(String entryCode)
      Make the tournament private, and restrict access with a entry code.
      You can either share this entry code directly with the users who should be able to join,
      or you could use it to create user-specific entry codes which you can share - see TournamentsApiAuth.generateUserEntryCodes(String, Set).
      Parameters:
      entryCode -

    • teamBattleByTeam

      TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams teamBattleByTeam(String teamBattleByTeam)
      Parameters:
      teamBattleByTeam - Set the ID of a team you lead to create a team battle. The other teams can be added using the team battle edit endpoint.

    • conditionTeam

      TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams conditionTeam(String conditionTeam)
      Parameters:
      conditionTeam - Restrict entry to members of a team. The teamId is the last part of a team URL, e.g. https://lichess.org/team/coders has teamId = coders.

    • conditionMinRating

      TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams conditionMinRating(int conditionMinRating)
      Parameters:
      conditionMinRating - Minimum rating to join.

    • conditionMaxRating

      TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams conditionMaxRating(int conditionMaxRating)
      Parameters:
      conditionMaxRating - Maximum rating to join. Based on best rating reached in the last 7 days.

    • conditionMinRatedGames

      TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams conditionMinRatedGames(int conditionMinRatedGames)
      Parameters:
      conditionMinRatedGames - Minimum number of rated games required to join.

    • conditionAccountAge

      TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams conditionAccountAge(int days)
      Parameters:
      days - Minimum account age, days.
      Valid values: [ 1, 3, 7, 14, 30, 60, 90, 180, 365, 365 * 2, 365 * 3 ]

    • allowList

      TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams allowList(Collection<String> allowList)
      Parameters:
      allowList - Predefined list of usernames that are allowed to join. If this list is non-empty, then usernames absent from this list will be forbidden to join. Example: List.of("thibault", "german11")

    • conditionTitled

      TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams conditionTitled(boolean titled)
      Parameters:
      titled - Restrict entry to titled players.

    • conditionTitled

      default TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams conditionTitled()

    • conditionBots

      TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams conditionBots(boolean allowed)
      Parameters:
      allowed - Whether bots are allowed to join the tournament. Default false

    • conditionBots

      default TournamentsApiAuth.ArenaParams conditionBots()
